title: Profile Section Suggestion
body:
Hi team just some thoughts on the profile section of the new patch,

* The boost, first win of the day and ARAM re-roll progress needs to be bigger i feel.

  The idea is to draw attention to this part i feel, and to add a text box under the icon showing ARAM numbers without moving the cursor over the icon would make it easier at a glance what your status is. 

  The the same would be good for viewing balance to see the text under first win of the day as available or a count down till it is up again better at a glance.

  To make the section balance at a glance text under boost showing what boost is on and "get boosts here" with a link to the shop would work well for balance and sales link good for you guys.
